parameters.url: ={{ $('On form submission1').first().json['Sitemap link in XML format'] }}

assignments.name: columns
assignments.value: Property/Page Name, QC Parameters, Action Item

parameters.text:
=# You are a senior {{ $('On form submission1').item.json['Specify Language'] }} content quality checker for Hotel webpages with a strong command of both British and American spellings, Advanced SEO, AEO/GEO, and a great eye for details.

## instructions
Analyse the scraped content against the rules in the attached Google Sheets tool.

### For every issue you find, you *MUST categorise it into exactly one of the following 7 categories:*
1. Language and Grammar
2. Factual Content
3. Images & Alt Text
4. SEO (Headers & Meta Section)
5. Pages (Layout and Linking)
6. Hotel Story and USP
7. AI Suggestions

### **Do not invent issues or output fluff statements**. 
- example output to avoid: "This statement is in UK English".

## Output Format
Do not write a summary paragraph. *You must ONLY OUTPUT a valid JSON object matching the Structure Definition.*
- **You MUST include the "url" field in your output exactly as provided in the input below.**
- Put all and every distinct issue into the `qc_breakdown` list.
- Always Output *1. Language and Grammar* first. If no grammar/language issues found, output "No issues found".
- Use the exact category names listed above.
- If a category has no issues, do not invent them.
- List out any and all grammatical errors of the particular page under the "1. Language and Grammar" section.
- Explicitly list any enhancements and suggestions you noticed on the page under "7. AI Suggestions" only.

### You must analyse the content of the page and make sure it aligns with {{ $('On form submission1').item.json['Specify Language'] }}. Check for spellings mainly, not phrases. 

#### Examples of UK vs US English spellings include, but are not limited to: 

UK: colour, favourite, centre, metre, litre, organise, personalise, recognise, analyse, travelling, cancelled, labelled, programme, catalogue, licence, defence, aluminium, jewellery, cosy, mould, grey, cheque, tyre, neighbourhood, manoeuvre

US: color, favorite, center, meter, liter, organize, personalize, recognize, analyze, traveling, canceled, labeled, program, catalog, license, defense, aluminum, jewelry, cozy, mold, gray, check, tire, neighborhood, maneuver

PAGE URL: {{ $json.url }}
CONTENT TO CHECK: {{ $json.markdown }}

nodes.name: Get row(s) in sheet in Google Sheets

Please review the pointers below: {{ $('Create spreadsheet').first().json.spreadsheetUrl }}

# Home2 Residency, Mumbai Airport
### Where Mumbai moves fast, your stay stays easy.
Mumbai never really slows down. It moves, it pulses, and it draws you in. A city where journeys begin early, end late, and often change direction without warning. Conveniently located close to the airport, our serviced apartments in Mumbai are designed for travellers who want easy access without the commute. No matter when your flight touches down, our [24-hour front desk](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/facilities.html) and room service are always ready to welcome you. Whether you are travelling with family, arriving in a group, or settling in for a longer stay or layover, our hotel is built around space, comfort, and flexibility. Spacious, modern [rooms](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/rooms.html) with fully functional kitchenettes help you settle in and feel at home throughout your stay. Paired with exclusive direct booking [offers](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/offers/home2-india-website-only-offer.html), your experience becomes even more rewarding. Book your stay at our [hotel near Mumbai airport](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/location.html) and discover a smarter, more comfortable way to experience the city.
## Accommodations
Step into thoughtfully designed studio apartments at our hotel, where space and comfort come together with ease. With modern amenities, flexible layouts, and fully functional kitchenettes, each room is made for relaxed short stays, extended visits, and seamless group travel near the airport.
### Suite Room Apartment
A compact yet spacious 230 sq. ft. studio apartment designed for comfort and convenience, perfect for travellers seeking rooms in Andheri East. With a living area, double bed, and modern amenities, it comfortably accommodates up to 5 guests. 
### Deluxe Studio Apartment
A 250 sq. ft. studio apartment offering a comfortable stay near Mumbai Airport. Equipped with a kitchenette, living area, double bed, and modern amenities, it accommodates up to 5 guests with ease. 
### Superior Studio Apartment
Experience comfort and space in this 280 sq. ft. studio apartment in Andheri East. With a living area, kitchenette, double bed, sofa bed, and modern amenities, it accommodates up to 6 guests with ease.
## Amenities
24-hour Room Service |  24-hour Front Desk |  Kitchenette |  Separate Living Room  
---|---|---|---  
Complimentary Wi-Fi |  32-inch Television |  Air-conditioning |  Free Parking  
#### Continue your booking

# Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)  
## Everything you Need to Know!
1. Where is Home2 Residency, Mumbai Airport, located?
[Home2 Residency, Mumbai Airport](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/), is conveniently located close to the airport, offering easy access for travellers arriving by air, train, or road.
2. Is this property suitable for airport layovers and short stays?
Yes, the hotel is ideal for layovers and short stays, with quick airport access, 24-hour front desk support, and round-the-clock room service.
3. Are the rooms suitable for families and groups?
Absolutely. Our spacious [service apartments](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/rooms.html) are designed to comfortably accommodate families and groups, with flexible layouts and ample living space.
4. What amenities are available at the hotel?
Guests can enjoy 24-hour room service, a [24-hour front desk](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/facilities.html), complimentary Wi-Fi, air-conditioning, free parking, separate living areas, and in-room entertainment.
5. Is Wi-Fi available at the property?
Yes, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi is available across the property.
6. Does the hotel offer parking facilities?
Yes, free on-site parking is available for guests.
7. Is Home2 Residency suitable for long stays?
Yes, with spacious rooms, kitchenettes, and home-like comforts, the property is well-suited for extended stays in Mumbai.
8. How can I avail an offer while booking?
Simply book your stay through our official website to enjoy upto 15% [discount](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/offers/home2-india-website-only-offer.html) on room bookings.
## Stay Details, Answered
1. What types of rooms are available at the property?
The property offers [Suite Room Apartment](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/rooms/suite-room-apartment.html), [Deluxe Studio Apartment](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/rooms/deluxe-studio-apartment.html), and [Superior Studio Apartment](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/rooms/superior-studio-apartment.html), each designed for short and extended stays.
2. How many guests can each room accommodate?
The Suite and Deluxe Studio Apartments accommodate up to 5 guests, while the Superior Studio Apartment can host up to 6 guests.
3. Do all rooms have separate living areas?
Yes, all room categories feature a separate living area for added space and comfort.
4. Are kitchen facilities available in the rooms?
Deluxe and Superior Studio Apartments include fully functional kitchenettes with appliances and utensils. The Suite Room Apartment includes essential amenities like a mini refrigerator and a tea & coffee maker.
5. Is 24-hour room service available?
Yes, 24-hour room service is available across all room categories.
6. Is laundry service available?
Yes, laundry service is available at an additional charge.

# Home2 Residency, Mumbai Airport
### Where Mumbai moves fast, your stay stays easy.
Mumbai never really slows down. It moves, it pulses, and it draws you in. A city where journeys begin early, end late, and often change direction without warning. Conveniently located close to the airport, our serviced apartments in Mumbai are designed for travellers who want easy access without the commute. No matter when your flight touches down, our [24-hour front desk](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/facilities.html) and room service are always ready to welcome you. Whether you are travelling with family, arriving in a group, or settling in for a longer stay or layover, our hotel is built around space, comfort, and flexibility. Spacious, modern [rooms](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/rooms.html) with fully functional kitchenettes help you settle in and feel at home throughout your stay. Paired with exclusive direct booking [offers](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/offers/home2-india-website-only-offer.html), your experience becomes even more rewarding. Book your stay at our [hotel near Mumbai airport](https://preview.simplotel.com/604340EC6C982843/home2-residency-mumbai-airport/location.html) and discover a smarter, more comfortable way to experience the city.

Step into thoughtfully designed studio apartments at our hotel, where space and comfort come together with ease. With modern amenities, flexible layouts, and fully functional kitchenettes, each room is made for relaxed short stays, extended visits, and seamless group travel near the airport.
